# The `MCObjectTargetWriter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for classes that define behaviour that is specific to both the target and the object format. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Base class for classes that define behaviour that is specific to both the target and the object format.
